name: Clean Youtube
description:
This is a very clean youtube layout. Just check the after pic..
Modify as you prefer, but please leave the /* By ... */ line intact if you wish to post the modified userstyle. Oh, and if some things are to width(eg. the video player), go to the /*Edit this*/ and modify the value. (it's written on a 15,4 inch screen...)
Thnx!
